name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Fly
setup: Sit on edge of bench, lean forward from hips
Hold dumbbells hanging below knees, palms facing each other
steps: Raise dumbbells out to sides in a wide arc
Lead with elbows, squeeze shoulder blades together
Raise until arms are parallel to floor
Lower with control back to starting position
cues: Squeeze shoulder blades together at top
Keep back flat, chest on thighs
Think about pulling elbows back, not lifting weights
safety: Keep back flat to protect lower back. Use light weight for strict form. Stop if you feel shoulder or lower back pain.

prescriptionHints.notes: Essential for shoulder health and posture. Use light weight with strict form. Focus on squeeze at top.

joints.notes: Keep back flat and core engaged. Light weight is appropriate - this is an isolation movement.
